title: Session 145: Managing Anxiety About the Coronavirus
itunes:title: Session 145: Managing Anxiety About the Coronavirus
description:
The Therapy for Black Girls Podcast is a weekly conversation with Dr. Joy Harden Bradford, a licensed Psychologist in Atlanta, Georgia, about all things mental health, personal development, and all the small decisions we can make to become the best possible versions of ourselves.

In this week's episode I'm sharing 7 tips to help manage your anxiety related to the coronavirus. 

 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
